languages.text: "Это тайна, мрачная, как вздох последнего бессмертного, глубокая, как темные океанские воды. И я мало что могу поведать, ибо была далеко... На миссии вместе с отрядом. В назначенный срок мы вернулись, но не нашли Крударах в его звездной гавани. Прошло уже столько ходов — столько "стандартных лет", как говорят у вас, — но я помню этот миг, словно он случился сегодня. Память об утрате всегда сильнее памяти об обретении, особенно когда теряешь нечто столь великое, как дом. Мир".

traits.locale_text: "Это тайна, мрачная, как вздох последнего бессмертного, глубокая, как темные океанские воды. И я мало что могу поведать, ибо была далеко... На миссии вместе с отрядом. В назначенный срок мы вернулись, но не нашли Крударах в его звездной гавани. Прошло уже столько ходов — столько "стандартных лет", как говорят у вас, — но я помню этот миг, словно он случился сегодня. Память об утрате всегда сильнее памяти об обретении, особенно когда теряешь нечто столь великое, как дом. Мир".

languages.text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."
languages.original_text: "Это тайна, мрачная, как вздох последнего бессмертного, глубокая, как темные океанские воды. И я мало что могу поведать, ибо была далеко... На миссии вместе с отрядом. В назначенный срок мы вернулись, но не нашли Крударах в его звездной гавани. Прошло уже столько ходов — столько "стандартных лет", как говорят у вас, — но я помню этот миг, словно он случился сегодня. Память об утрате всегда сильнее памяти об обретении, особенно когда теряешь нечто столь великое, как дом. Мир".

traits.locale_text: "It is a mystery as dark as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far... On a mission with my squad. We came back on time but did not find Crudarach it its celestial harbor. It happened many turns ago — or "standard years ", as you say — but I remember that moment as if happened today. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as home. Or an entire world."

We came back on time but did not find Crudarach it its celestial harbor. It happened many turns ago — or "standard years ", as you say — but I remember that moment as if happened today. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as home. Or an entire world."

The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

languages.text: “这依然是个难以捉摸的谜团，就像最后的不朽者的叹息一样沉重，就像黑暗之海的水一样深。我能告诉你的事情不多，因为我当时不在那里……我和我的部队正在执行任务。我们在约定的时间返回星港，但克鲁达拉赫却不见了踪影。这件事情发生在许多场旅程之前，或者用你们的话说，是许多个标准年之前。但我依然记得那一刻，就仿佛它刚刚发生一样。关于失去的记忆，总会比关于获得的记忆更加深刻，尤其当你失去的是家园这样重要的东西，或者说，失去的是整个世界。”
languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: “这依然是个难以捉摸的谜团，就像最后的不朽者的叹息一样沉重，就像黑暗之海的水一样深。我能告诉你的事情不多，因为我当时不在那里……我和我的部队正在执行任务。我们在约定的时间返回星港，但克鲁达拉赫却不见了踪影。这件事情发生在许多场旅程之前，或者用你们的话说，是许多个标准年之前。但我依然记得那一刻，就仿佛它刚刚发生一样。关于失去的记忆，总会比关于获得的记忆更加深刻，尤其当你失去的是家园这样重要的东西，或者说，失去的是整个世界。”

languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

languages.text: «Es un misterio tan inescrutable como el suspiro del último inmortal, tan profundo como las aguas de un océano negro. Y puedo contarte poco sobre ello, pues estaba muy lejos... en una misión con mi unidad. Volvimos a la hora acordada, pero no encontramos Crudarach en su puerto celestial. Ocurrió hace muchos viajes... años estándar, como dice vuestra especia, pero recuerdo cada momento como si hubiera ocurrido hoy mismo. La impresión que causa una pérdida es siempre mayor que la de un logro, especialmente cuando lo que pierdes es algo tan vital como un hogar. O un mundo entero».
languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: «Es un misterio tan inescrutable como el suspiro del último inmortal, tan profundo como las aguas de un océano negro. Y puedo contarte poco sobre ello, pues estaba muy lejos... en una misión con mi unidad. Volvimos a la hora acordada, pero no encontramos Crudarach en su puerto celestial. Ocurrió hace muchos viajes... años estándar, como dice vuestra especia, pero recuerdo cada momento como si hubiera ocurrido hoy mismo. La impresión que causa una pérdida es siempre mayor que la de un logro, especialmente cuando lo que pierdes es algo tan vital como un hogar. O un mundo entero».

languages.text: 「それは最後のイモータルのため息のように不可解な謎であり、暗い海の水のように深い。我が伝えられることはごくわずかだ。なぜなら、我は部隊の任務で遠く離れていたのだから。定刻に戻ったが、星の港にクルダラはいなかった。もう何年も前のことで…そなたが言うところの『標準的な年月』においてだが…我はその時のことをまるで今日起こったことのように鮮明に覚えている。失ったものの記憶は常に、得たものの記憶よりも強いものだ。特にそれが、故郷を、あるいは惑星全体を失った場合はな」
languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: 「それは最後のイモータルのため息のように不可解な謎であり、暗い海の水のように深い。我が伝えられることはごくわずかだ。なぜなら、我は部隊の任務で遠く離れていたのだから。定刻に戻ったが、星の港にクルダラはいなかった。もう何年も前のことで…そなたが言うところの『標準的な年月』においてだが…我はその時のことをまるで今日起こったことのように鮮明に覚えている。失ったものの記憶は常に、得たものの記憶よりも強いものだ。特にそれが、故郷を、あるいは惑星全体を失った場合はな」

languages.text: "Es ist ein Mysterium so unergründlich wie das Seufzen des letzten Unsterblichen, so tief wie die Wasser eines dunklen Ozeans. Und ich kann Euch wenig darüber sagen, denn ich war weit weg ... auf einer Mission mit meiner Einheit. Wir kehrten zur vereinbarten Stunde zurück, doch wir fanden Crudarach nicht in seinem himmlischen Hafen vor. Es geschah schon vor vielen Reisen ... oder 'Standardjahren', wie Ihr sagt ... und doch erinnere ich mich an diesen Augenblick, als wäre es heute erst geschehen. Die Erinnerung an etwas Verlorenes ist immer stärker, als die an etwas Gewonnenes, vor allem, wenn man etwas so Bedeutsames wie ein Zuhause verliert. Oder eine ganze Welt."
languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein Mysterium so unergründlich wie das Seufzen des letzten Unsterblichen, so tief wie die Wasser eines dunklen Ozeans. Und ich kann Euch wenig darüber sagen, denn ich war weit weg ... auf einer Mission mit meiner Einheit. Wir kehrten zur vereinbarten Stunde zurück, doch wir fanden Crudarach nicht in seinem himmlischen Hafen vor. Es geschah schon vor vielen Reisen ... oder 'Standardjahren', wie Ihr sagt ... und doch erinnere ich mich an diesen Augenblick, als wäre es heute erst geschehen. Die Erinnerung an etwas Verlorenes ist immer stärker, als die an etwas Gewonnenes, vor allem, wenn man etwas so Bedeutsames wie ein Zuhause verliert. Oder eine ganze Welt."

languages.text: « Il s'agit là d'un mystère aussi insondable que le soupir du dernier immortel, aussi profond que les eaux de l'océan. Je sais peu de choses à ce sujet, car j'avais été envoyée en mission avec mon unité et je me trouvais bien loin lorsque la tragédie a frappé. À notre retour, pourtant le jour prévu, nous n'avons pas trouvé Crudarach au port céleste où il devait nous attendre. Cela s'est produit il y a de nombreux voyages, ou de nombreuses "années standard" comme vous le dites, mais je me souviens de ce moment comme si c'était hier. Le souvenir d'une perte est toujours plus fort que celui d'un gain, surtout lorsque l'on perd quelque chose d'aussi important que son foyer. Ou un monde entier. »
languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit là d'un mystère aussi insondable que le soupir du dernier immortel, aussi profond que les eaux de l'océan. Je sais peu de choses à ce sujet, car j'avais été envoyée en mission avec mon unité et je me trouvais bien loin lorsque la tragédie a frappé. À notre retour, pourtant le jour prévu, nous n'avons pas trouvé Crudarach au port céleste où il devait nous attendre. Cela s'est produit il y a de nombreux voyages, ou de nombreuses "années standard" comme vous le dites, mais je me souviens de ce moment comme si c'était hier. Le souvenir d'une perte est toujours plus fort que celui d'un gain, surtout lorsque l'on perd quelque chose d'aussi important que son foyer. Ou un monde entier. »

languages.text: "Son ölümsüzün iç çekişi kadar esrarlı, karanlık bir okyanusun suları kadar derin bir gizem bu. Ama anlatacaklarım sınırlı çünkü o vakitler uzaktaydım. Birimimle birlikte bir misyondaydık. Kararlaştırdığımız saatte geri dönmüştük ancak Crudarach'ı gök limanında bulamadık. Bunun üzerinden pek çok devir, sizin deyişinizle standart yıl geçti ama o anı sanki bugün yaşanmış gibi hatırlıyorum. Kaybettiğin bir şeyin hatırası, kazandığın bir şeyin hatırasından her daim güçlüdür. Hele ki yuvan kadar önemli bir şeyi... Ya da koca bir dünyayı kaybettiysen."
languages.original_text: "It is a mystery as inscrutable as the sigh of the last immortal, as deep as the waters of a dark ocean. And I can tell you little, for I was far away... on a mission with my unit. We returned at the appointed hour but we did not find Crudarach in its celestial harbour. It happened many journeys ago — or 'standard years,' as you say — but I remember that moment as if it happened this very day. The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

Birimimle birlikte bir misyondaydık. Kararlaştırdığımız saatte geri dönmüştük ancak Crudarach'ı gök limanında bulamadık. Bunun üzerinden pek çok devir, sizin deyişinizle standart yıl geçti ama o anı sanki bugün yaşanmış gibi hatırlıyorum. Kaybettiğin bir şeyin hatırası, kazandığın bir şeyin hatırasından her daim güçlüdür. Hele ki yuvan kadar önemli bir şeyi... Ya da koca bir dünyayı kaybettiysen."
